description:
Ken-san asks about doing a story with the sub characters that are based on Yuzuki and Wakamatsu. Wakamatsu then visits Nozaki, telling him that Yuzuki gave him movie tickets and he doesn`t know what to do. Nozaki then tells Wakamatsu that he should totally go with Yuzuki, despite his obvious reservations, and so Wakamatsu ends up on a date with Yuzuki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tsuyomaru no wa, Kizuna to Tazuna.
What`s Strengthened Is Our Bond and Our Reins
強まるのは, 絆と手綱.
